title: Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1800
markings: Marks: On bottom very faintly impressed into glass: B. Edwards Belfast
provenance: Cecil Davis, Ltd.; 1965 Phelps Warren, NY.
description: Bulbous, lightly blown body, 2 neck rings-knotched, everted lip, row of faint molded vertical fluting bottom of sides, above engraved with a rose, thistle and shamrock; target shaped stopper with waffle pattern; bottom: pontil mark surrounded by maker's mark (faint) and light fluting to edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-178-a,b.
